function.name: dishWashing_getSupportedCourses
function.description: This function is used to retrieve the available courses for a dishwasher.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to check the supported courses.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment for checking the supported courses.
